#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
  int n,i=1,j,count;
  char str[100];
  
  cin>>n;
  
  getchar();
  while(i<=n)
 {
   gets(str);
   count=0;
   for(j=0;j<strlen(str);j++)
   {
     if(str[j]=='A'||str[j]=='D'||str[j]=='P'||str[j]=='O'||str[j]=='R'||str[j]=='Q')
     count=count+1;
     else if(str[j]=='B')
     count=count+2;
     else
     count=count+0;
   }
   cout<<count<<endl;
   i++;
 }
 return 0;
}
